effect.sun_moon: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.sun_moon: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
